sentence.Network_en: We will be pleased to delete the charge from the original invoice.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们决定将这笔费用从原始发票上删去。

sentence.Network_en: A clerk simply verifies that the payment and invoice amount match.
sentence.Network_cn: 职员只是核实付款和发票上的数额是否一致。

sentence.Network_en: The seller has to issue a tax invoice.
sentence.Network_cn: 销售者必须开具税务发票.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2．发票（INVOICE）或称商业发票（Commercial Invoice）。外贸的“发票”概念和国内的财务发票完全不同。
正本商业发票（INVOICE）、正本装箱单（PACKING LIST）、副本合同（也可称作形式发票或售货确认书）、报关单、副本委托报 …
客户交谈英语 ... Equal 等于 Invoice 发票,发货单. Gasoline 汽油.
雅思词汇词根+联想记忆法 ... invisible a. 看不见的,无形的 invoice vt. 开发票; involve vt. 包含;使卷入;牵涉.

list.abs: 发票号（Invoice No.），日期（Date），合同号（S/C No.），船名(Vessel Name)，航次(Voyage No.)，提单号(B/L No.)，上船日期(…
报关常用英语 - 豆丁网 ... customs valuation 海关估价 Consignment invoice 寄售发票 date of arrival 到达日期.
各类常见进出口单证及样本 ... 海关发票（ Customs Invoice） 领事发票（ Consular Invoice） 形式发票（ Proforma Invoice）.
【货代知识】货代常用英文缩写 ... 过境货 transit cargo 海关发票 customs invoice 海关监管货物 goods under customs supervision.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: originally the plural of obsolete invoy, from obsolete French envoy from envoyer 'send' (see envoy)

entry.def: An invoice is a document that lists goods that have been supplied or services that have been done, and says how much money you owe for them.

example.ex: We will then send you an invoice for the total course fees...
example.tran: 然后我们会把全部课程费用的发票寄给你。

example.ex: His £200 invoice was settled immediately in cash.
example.tran: 他立即以现金付清了 200 英镑的货款。

entry.def: If you invoice someone, you send them a bill for goods or services you have provided them with.

example.tran: 代理处为客户开具发票。

means.word_mean: 1. an itemized statement of money owed for goods shipped or services rendered;

sentences.sentence: "send me an account of what I owe"
"She invoiced the company for her expenses"

auth_sentence.content: I agreed to this and received a new invoice.

auth_sentence.content: Our invoice wasn't being paid, yet Mr Conti got millions.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our invoice wasn't being paid, yet Mr Conti got millions.

auth_sentence.content: You can, for instance, attach a billing invoice to a payment.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can, for instance, attach a billing invoice to a payment.

sentences.en: The seller has to issue a tax invoice.
sentences.cn: 销售者必须开具税务发票。

sentences.en: The shipping costs can be as high as 50% of the invoice value of the goods.
sentences.cn: 货运费用最高可以达到货物发票金额的50% 。
